context: hey how are you? I'm looking for some movies to watch. Can you recommend some movies anything will work I'm not picky about the genre I mean.... I like war and action movies but I will watch anything that is good except rom coms I don't really like those. Lol
Hey. Anything like The Fast and the Furious?
I've seen the first and tokyo drift that it what else do you recommend
What about Forrest Gump (1994) or Independence Day: Resurgence (2016)?
I seen the first one but not the second
I'll check that out what else do you suggest?
resp: Be sure to watch the Independence Day (1996) first. It's better.
